messages.subject: I'm So Sorry! Re: Evenstar75@gmail.com has invited you to have a 3D avatar chat
messages.msgSnippet: Everyone, I am EXTREMELY sorry.  I am doing everything in my power to ensure that this is the last time you will hear from me about this. Please reply if you d
messages.messageBody:
Everyone, I am EXTREMELY sorry. I am doing everything in my power to
ensure that this is the last time you will hear from me about this.
Please reply if you'd like a further explanation, but as I've already
wasted everyone's time and cluttered up their inboxes, I won't go into
further detail unless requested.

--
Andrea L. Roher
Searching for my place in "Life, the Universe, and Everything" one day
at a time.
... maybe I've finally found it in NH! (www.FreeStateProject.org)
Visit my blog at evenstar75.blogspot.com.
